abstract: American Airlines reports doubling of its second-quarter profit to $1.7 billion, attributable in large part to lower cost of jet fuel; is record quarter for the company, after excluding one-time costs and gains.
lead_paragraph: The results capped an astonishing earnings season for the nation’s biggest airlines, several of which reported record profits in the April-through-June quarter.
snippet: The results capped an astonishing earnings season for the nation’s biggest airlines, several of which reported record profits in the April-through-June quarter.
